welcome_message_body: Welcome to Xirdalan, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historic landmarks, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Xirdalan has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Эмин PUB

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Heydar Aliyev International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Heydar Aliyev International Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
